title: Frequently Asked Questions
subtitle: Here you'll find answers to common questions

q1.title: 📅 When is the meeting?
q1.answer: The meeting is held every Friday at 6:00 PM.

q2.title: 📍 Where do we meet?
q2.answer: At St. Mary & St. George Church, Gabriel, Alexandria, Egypt.

q3.title: 📞 What is the servant's phone number?
q3.answer: You can reach the responsible servant at 01201047167.

q4.title: 💰 What is the wallet system?
q4.answer: The wallet is like a virtual account for each youth. You earn balance by attending weekly meetings or winning in competitions. You can use your balance to book trips.

q5.title: ✉️ How can I contact the service leader or ask for help?
q5.answer: You can send a message, prayer request, or complaint through the Contact section. You can also choose to stay anonymous if you prefer.

q6.title: ⛪ Can I join if I'm from another church?
q6.answer: Absolutely! We’d love to have you as part of our family. You’re welcome anytime.
